backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that includes authorization and blob storage mixins, initializing access control state and composing functionality from MixinAuthorization and MixinStorage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including landing page hero section, about section, problem-solution section, security section, and global capability section with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the AXOPAY application with a root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router configuration using TanStack Router, defining all routes for public pages (landing, login, signup), client dashboard pages, and admin pages with their respective layouts.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin layout component with sidebar navigation for admin features (dashboard, users, financial, plans, config, rewards, reports, notifications), header with logout, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainLayou: Client layout component with sidebar navigation for user features (dashboard, wallet, plans, referrals, binary, rewards, earnings, profile), header with logout, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Public-facing layout component with header containing AXOPAY branding and login/signup buttons, main content outlet, and footer with copyright and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance using Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, defining color schemes (primary, secondary, accent, etc.) and utility classes for gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
Admin dashboard displaying platform metrics including user counts, deposits, withdrawals, revenue, and pending approvals using card-based layout with icons.
Admin login page with form for admin ID and password authentication, integrating Internet Identity and displaying 2FA requirement notice.
frontend/src/pages/admin/FinancialContro: Placeholder page for financial control features with info alert indicating pending backend integration for deposit and withdrawal management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/NotificationsPa: Placeholder page for system notifications and announcements management with info alert about future implementation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PlanManagementP: Placeholder page for investment plan configuration with info alert indicating pending backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ReferralBinaryC: Placeholder page for referral and binary system configuration settings with info alert about future implementation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ReportsPage.tsx: Placeholder page for platform analytics and reports with info alert indicating pending backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/admin/RewardsManageme: Placeholder page for milestone rewards configuration with info alert about future implementation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Placeholder page for user account and permissions management with info alert indicating pending backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/client/BinaryPage.tsx: Client binary system page showing left/right leg volumes, matched pairs, carry forward, daily earnings limit progress, and pair income tracking.
Client dashboard displaying wallet balances (main, earnings, withdrawal), active plan ROI progress, total earnings breakdown, team size, and recent transactions list.
frontend/src/pages/client/EarningsPage.t: Displays earnings breakdown by type (ROI, referral, binary, rewards) with total earnings cards and a transaction history table with filtering and export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/client/PlansPage.tsx: Shows available investment plans (BEGIN, GROW, PEAK) with pricing and features, plus an active plan ROI tracker displaying progress, earnings, and remaining days.
frontend/src/pages/client/ProfilePage.ts: Profile management page with tabs for personal info, security, KYC, and notifications; currently shows placeholder content with an alert indicating future backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/client/ReferralPage.t: Referral system page displaying referral stats, copyable referral link, and a list of direct referrals with their join dates, plans, and status.
frontend/src/pages/client/RewardsPage.ts: Milestone rewards page showing progress toward achievement goals with claimable bonuses and a history of previously claimed rewards.
frontend/src/pages/client/WalletPage.tsx: Wallet management page with tabs for overview, deposit, withdraw, transfer, convert, and history; currently shows wallet balances and placeholder content for future functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Password reset page with email input form that displays a success message after submission.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, feature cards showcasing global payments/transfers, and problem-solution sections promoting AXOPAY's services.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with email/username and password fields that integrates Internet Identity authentication and redirects to dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Registration page with multi-field form (name, email, phone, password, country, referral) that validates input and triggers Internet Identity login flow.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear sensitive parameters from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens for a multi-theme UI system with sidebar, chart, and semantic color variables.
project_state.json: Project state document for AXOPAY, a global digital wallet and payment platform with multi-currency support, ROI plans, binary matching engine, referral/reward system, and comprehensive admin controls across public website, client portal, and admin panel modules.
